thread.title: Vein viewer makes your veins glow - Business Insider
thread.title_full: Vein viewer makes your veins glow - Business Insider

author: Corey Protin
title: Vein viewer makes your veins glow - Business Insider
text:
embed 
Sometimes getting a needle prick at the doctor's may feel like Russian roulette. Luckily, for those of us who are scared of needles, you can now breathe a little more easily. Christie Med's Vein Viewer 2 has the ability to show doctors where the veins underneath your skin are located. While the technology isn't new, it's still pretty fantastic.
